Articles.Content:
Wayward Terran Frontier (WTF) will be a game where you can craft your own spaceship/station or what you want, a bit like Kerbal, except in a huge futuristic multiplayer universe.

It is a project by Georg Hultgren.

He is programming on this game for several years now and already has established a playable alpha version of his game.

Now he would like to proceed to the next phase, which he will tell you on his kickstarter page.

If you love Kerbal as much as I do, you might enjoy this game too.

Best regards

Joe

Here the link to the Kickstarter page:

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1084206971/wayward-terran-frontier
